Product Specification.description: The 4CH SD 1080P Mobile DVR MR9504EC is a robust vehicle surveillance system featuring high-performance SigmaStar image chipsets and H.265/H.264 encoding for superior video quality and compression. This DVR supports 4CH 1080P live preview and recording, with 1CH AV and VGA outputs. It includes advanced features such as image mirroring, rotation adjustments, and GPS drift suppression. The device operates on a wide voltage range (9-36V DC) and is protected against low voltage, short circuits, and reverse connections. Data is securely stored on SD cards (up to 512GB) with encryption and built-in super capacitor protection to prevent data loss. It runs on Embedded Linux OS with multi-language support and provides flexible recording and playback options.

SpecializationPoints.description: High-performance SigmaStar image chipsets for enhanced video processing.
Utilizes H.265/H.264 encoding for efficient compression and high-quality images.
Supports 4CH 1080P live preview and recording with 1CH AV and 1CH VGA outputs.
Operates on a wide voltage range (9-36V DC) with protection against voltage issues and intelligent power management.
Supports SD cards up to 512GB with encryption and super capacitor to prevent data loss.
Features image horizontal and vertical mirror adjustment and 90-degree rotation.
Supports GPS/BD with high sensitivity and fast positioning.
Runs on Embedded Linux OS with support for multiple languages (Chinese/English/Russian).
Provides synchronized audio/video recording with flexible combination and playback modes.
Functional in temperatures ranging from -20°C to 70°C.

Product Specification.description: The Five in One 4CH SD Mobile DVR (MR9504E) is a versatile vehicle surveillance solution with advanced H.264/H.265 video compression for excellent image quality and storage efficiency. It supports AHD/TVI/CVI/IPC/Analog video inputs and offers 4+1 live preview capabilities. The DVR features built-in G-sensor, reverse assistance, and allows for horizontal, vertical, and 90-degree camera adjustments. It operates on a wide voltage range (8-36V DC) and includes robust data protection with a super capacitor. With options for GPS, 3G/4G, and WiFi connectivity, this DVR is ideal for comprehensive vehicle monitoring.

SpecializationPoints.description: 170-degree ultra-wide-angle lens for comprehensive coverage.
4-inch high-definition touch screen for easy operation and settings adjustment.
Supports up to 1080P video resolution for clear recording.
Circular recording with no missing seconds and automatic start/stop.

Product Specification.description: The Five-in-One 4CH 1080P H.265 HDD Mobile DVR MR9704E is a versatile and high-performance device designed for advanced vehicle surveillance. Featuring highperformance chipsets and H.265 encoding for superior image quality and compression, this DVR supports multiple video inputs including AHD, TVI, CVI, IPC, and Analog. It offers 4+1 live preview and recording, with options for synchronized AV and VGA outputs. The DVR includes a built-in Gsensor for monitoring driving habits and supports reverse assistance. Power protection features, smart power management, and data encryption ensure reliability and durability. It supports up to 4TB HDD/SSD and 512GB SD card storage.

It includes a built-in G-sensor, reverse assistance, and optional hard disk auto-heating. With a wide voltage range (8-36V DC) and robust data protection, it supports up to 4TB HDD/SSD and 512GB SD card storage. Optional wireless modules provide GPS, 3G/4G, and WiFi connectivity.

The system enhances driving safety with real-time alerts and supports various storage options.

Product Specification.description: The 7-Inch VGA Monitor is a high-quality display designed for versatility and performance. Featuring a 7-inch TFT-LCD screen with a 16:09 aspect ratio and a resolution of 800x480, this monitor provides clear and vibrant visuals. With a brightness of 350cd/m² and a contrast ratio of 400:1, it ensures excellent image clarity. The monitor supports both CVBS and VGA video inputs and offers adjustable settings for brightness, contrast, and chroma. It operates within a wide temperature range and has a low power consumption of less than 6W. Ideal for various applications, it includes multiple language options for the OSD.

Product Specification.description: The AXEL GUARD-150RH is a high-performance TruVision IP 18/36X Speed Dome camera designed for advanced surveillance. Featuring a 2 MP Full HD sensor with a 150- meter true night vision range, it ensures clear images even in low light conditions. The camera utilizes H.265/264 compression technology for efficient video streaming and is ONVIF compliant for compatibility with various systems. With 360° endless rotation, fast pan and tilt speeds, and 128 preset positions, it offers versatile monitoring capabilities. The AXEL GUARD-150RH is IP66 rated for weather resistance and includes optional SDHC card support for local storage.

SpecializationPoints.description: 2 MP Full HD sensor with 1/2.8" Progressive Scan CMOS for high-resolution imaging.
True Night Vision up to 150 meters for effective surveillance in darkness.
Advanced H.265/264 compression for high-quality video with reduced bandwidth.
360° endless rotation with pan speed up to 240°/s and tilt speed up to 200°/s.
128 preset positions, 8 preset tours, and 4 shadow tours for customized monitoring.
High-speed dome with optional 7 alarm inputs and 2 relay outputs for enhanced security.
IP66 rated for protection against dust and water ingress.
DWDR for improved image quality in varying lighting conditions.
Supports DC12V, PoE+, and 24VAC for flexible installation.
ONVIF compliant with support for various platforms, including private, PSIA, CGI.

Product Specification.description: The AXEL GUARD-150RH TruVision IP 18/36X 2MP Speed Bullet Camera combines advanced features for high-performance surveillance. Equipped with a 1/2.8" Progressive Scan CMOS sensor, it delivers Full HD 1080p resolution with true night vision up to 150 meters. The camera uses H.265/264 compression for efficient video storage and is ONVIF compliant for interoperability. With 128 preset positions, 8 preset tours, and 4 shadow tours, it offers comprehensive coverage. It supports a wide dynamic range and features 360° endless rotation, 240°/s pan speed, and 200°/s tilt speed. The camera is IP66 rated, ensuring durability in various weather conditions.

Operates effectively in temperatures ranging from -10°C to +40°C.

Product Specification.description: The TL-ADAS-S2 ADAS Camera is designed for advanced driving assistance systems, featuring the SOI H65 CMOS image sensor for superior image quality. It provides Full HD 720P resolution with a 3.6 mm focal length lens, offering a wide view angle of 85° (diagonal), 60° (horizontal), and 53° (vertical). The camera supports PAL signal type and operates at 25 frames per second. It is designed to function effectively in temperatures ranging from -25°C to 75°C with a humidity tolerance of up to 90%. The camera operates on 12V DC with a power consumption of just 0.8W and includes a 2.5-meter aviation connector cable for easy installation.

SpecializationPoints.description: SOI H65 CMOS image sensor for high-quality imaging.
Full HD 720P for clear and detailed video.

Product Specification.description: The TL-BSD-EF2 is a high-performance BSD Camera equipped with the GC2053 CMOS Image Sensor, offering Full HD 720P resolution for clear and detailed video. It features a wide viewing angle with D=186°, H=150°, and V=89°, ensuring comprehensive coverage. The camera supports 2D noise reduction (NR) for improved image clarity. It operates within a temperature range of -25°C to 75°C and humidity levels up to 90%. With a 12V DC input and a low power consumption of 0.8W, the TL-BSD-EF2 is designed for durability and efficiency. Its aviation connector allows for a 0.5 m cable length, and the pin configuration includes voltage control, access point, and AHD video signal input.

Product Specification.description: The 4 Inch 2 Channel Dashcam offers comprehensive recording capabilities for both front and rear views. It features a 4-inch display for easy monitoring and playback, along with dual-channel recording to capture both the road ahead and the interior or rear of the vehicle.

Product Specification.description: The 4-Inch 3-Channel Touch Screen Dash Cam offers high-definition video recording with a user-friendly interface. Equipped with a 170-degree ultrawide-angle lens, it captures clear footage from both front and rear cameras. The device features a touch screen for easy mode selection, photo and video capture, and playback. It supports seamless circular video recording with no gaps, automatic start/stop based on vehicle power, and motion detection. Additional functions include parking monitoring, HDR for low-light conditions, and gravity induction to lock critical footage during collisions. Its versatile connectivity options and intuitive controls make it an ideal choice for comprehensive vehicle surveillance.

10-inch high-definition touch screen for easy operation and settings adjustment.

Product Specification.description: The 10-Inch Android Dash Cam combines advanced technology and versatile features for optimal vehicle monitoring. Powered by a Spreadtrum SL8541E processor and Android 8.1, this dash cam boasts a full touch screen interface and supports high-definition video recording in both front and rear cameras. It offers a range of connectivity options, including 2G, 3G, and 4G support, as well as Wi-Fi and Bluetooth. Key functionalities include GPS navigation, voice recording, FM transmission, and ADAS safety warnings. The device ensures seamless loop recording, customizable settings, and comprehensive driving data capture, enhancing overall driving security and convenience.

Featuring a 12-inch IPS HD touch screen, it offers clear, high-resolution video with 3840x2160 pixels at 30 frames per second. The dash cam includes dual lenses with a 160-degree wide-angle for extensive coverage. Equipped with an Allwinner V533 chip and high-sensitivity CMOS image sensor, it ensures detailed and reliable footage. The device supports micro SD cards up to 128GB, seamless loop recording, and has built-in GPS, WiFi, and motion detection capabilities. It operates in extreme temperatures and supports multiple languages for global usability.

Product Specification.ProductDescription: The MR3876A UHF RFID Animal Ear Tracking Tag is a cutting-edge 2.4G active RFID solution designed for large-scale livestock management. It addresses the limitations of traditional passive ear tags by offering a remarkable communication range of up to 400 meters with a high recognition rate of 99%. Featuring a unique, unchangeable ID number and customizable laser engraving options, this tag supports future expansions such as temperature and motion recognition. With a durable ABS construction and an IP67 rating, it ensures reliable performance under various environmental conditions. The tag's lightweight design and long battery life make it ideal for extensive agricultural applications.

SpecializationPoints.description: Up to 400 meters with a 2.4G Ultra-long Range Integrated Reader.
High accuracy with a 99% recognition rate due to advanced anti-collision algorithm.
Global unique ID number; customizable with laser engraving.
Supports additional features such as temperature recognition, motion detection, and light alarms.
Made of heat-resistant ABS material and rated IP67 for water and dust resistance.
Up to 3 years, minimizing maintenance needs.
Weighs only 17 grams, ensuring comfort for animals.
Functional from -20°C to +60°C, suitable for various climates.
Easy ear-piercing installation.

Product Specification.description: The 2.4G Active Tag (Card Type) HX607 is a versatile and robust RFID solution designed for various tracking applications. It features powerful anti-jamming capabilities, a wide effective reading range up to 80 meters, and multi-tag reading of over 100 tags per second. Its ultra-low power consumption ensures a battery life of up to 3 years. The hybrid design supports both 2.4G and 13.56MHz frequencies, making it adaptable for school attendance, employee tracking, and vehicle tracking. With an IP67 rating, the HX607 is heat-resistant and built to withstand harsh environments.

Product Specification.description: The MR 6700A UHF Passive Electronic Tag is designed for high-efficiency, flexible identification and tracking. It operates within the ISM 860-960MHz frequency range, suitable for both fixed frequency and frequency-hopping work modes. The tag supports ISO18000- 6C (EPC GEN2) transponders, providing a read distance of up to 8 meters, extending to over 12 meters depending on the reader and antenna. With a robust passive design requiring no battery, it offers more than 100,000 read-write cycles and a lifespan exceeding ten years. The MR 6700A can read and write multiple tags simultaneously, making it ideal for high-volume applications.

SpecializationPoints.description: Operates within ISM 860-960MHz for broad frequency compliance.
Effective read range of up to 8 meters, extendable to over 12 meters.
Supports both fixed frequency and frequency-hopping work modes.
Capable of reading/writing up to 50 tags per second.
Passive design with no battery, allowing for over 100,000 read-write cycles.
More than ten years of effective usage.

Product Specification.description: The MR6740A UHF Windshield Tag is a durable, eco-friendly paper sticker designed for easy application on glass surfaces. This passive RFID tag operates within the ISM 860- 960MHz frequency range and supports ISO18000-6C and EPC Class1 Gen2 protocols. With a reading range of over 8 meters, it excels in both fixed frequency and frequency-hopping work modes. The tag features a high-performance chip and antenna with a robust anti-disturbance capability, and its read-write memory supports over 100,000 cycles with a lifespan exceeding ten years. Ideal for diverse applications, it offers a practical solution for efficient and flexible RFID integration.

SpecializationPoints.description: Eco-friendly, tear-proof paper sticker designed for glass surfaces.

Product Specification.description: The 2.4G IOT Smart RFID Reader (ZR7901P) is an advanced RFID reader designed for the IoT market, ideal for data collection and location tracking. Utilizing 2.4GHz ISM open band, it features a dual-polarized directional antenna capable of reading up to 400 meters. The reader supports four antennas for precise orientation of RFID tags and includes a power failure alarm with a buffer power supply. Device management is facilitated through TCP/IP, GPRS, and Bluetooth BLE4.0. With high reliability, the MR7901P is rainproof, lightning protected, and resistant to typhoon-level winds, making it suitable for various outdoor tracking applications.

Product Specification.description: 2.4 G Omni-directional reader suit for 'non-directional identify'. 2.4G RFID reader applying in far distance, quick identification, meeting the special demand of identification, can identify, track and orientate more than 100 active tags simultaneity. making it ideal for indoor attendance, access control, and asset management. Its ceiling mount design and double polarization minimize signal blind areas. Compatible with all RealTrack RFID active tags, it offers a reading range of 20cm to 80m. The device supports RS232 and TCP/IP communication, operates on 9V DC, and has CE and FCC certifications.

Product Specification.description: The MR6211E UHF Long Range RFID Reader is a high-performance device designed for versatile applications. Featuring a built-in 12 dBi antenna, it ensures an impressive reading range of up to 12 meters and supports multiple RFID tag protocols, including EPC Class1 Gen 2 and ISO 18000-6C. Its robust design is waterproof and UV-resistant, making it ideal for outdoor environments. The reader supports various communication interfaces, including Ethernet, RS232, RS485, and Wiegand, and allows for flexible parameter settings via a web interface. With a read speed of 200 tags per second, it is suitable for applications in traffic management, logistics, and access control.

SpecializationPoints.description: Up to 12 meters, adjustable via testing software.
Built-in 12 dBi linear polarization antenna for long-range performance.

Product Specification.description: The VGA Cable is designed for connecting video devices, such as monitors and projectors, to computers and other video output sources. It provides a reliable connection for transmitting high-quality analog video signals.

SpecializationPoints.description: Transmits high-quality analog video signals, ensuring clear and accurate display on connected devices.
Equipped with standard VGA connectors (15-pin) for compatibility with a wide range of devices.
Constructed with high-quality materials for durability and resistance to wear and tear.
Features a flexible and easy-to-handle design, making installation and routing simple and convenient.
Includes shielding to reduce interference and signal degradation, ensuring stable video performance.
Suitable for various applications, including connecting computers, monitors, projectors, and other video equipment.

Product Specification.description: The Alcohol Tester is a portable device designed to measure the blood alcohol concentration (BAC) of an individual. It provides accurate and quick results, making it a valuable tool for personal and professional use to ensure safety and compliance with regulations.

SpecializationPoints.description: Utilizes advanced sensor technology to provide precise blood alcohol concentration readings.
Features a simple and intuitive interface for easy operation and quick results.
Provides rapid analysis and display of BAC levels, offering immediate feedback.
Compact and lightweight design for convenient carrying and use in various locations.
Includes calibration options and maintenance reminders to ensure ongoing accuracy and reliability.
Supports various testing modes, including single-use and continuous monitoring, for versatile applications.

Product Specification.description: The Fuel Sensor is designed to accurately measure the level of fuel in a tank and provide real-time data. It is essential for monitoring fuel levels, optimizing fuel usage, and preventing fuel-related issues in vehicles and machinery.

SpecializationPoints.description: Provides precise fuel level readings to ensure accurate monitoring and management of fuel consumption.
Delivers real-time fuel level data for timely decisions and efficient fuel management.
Built with high-quality materials to withstand harsh conditions and ensure long-term reliability.
Designed for straightforward installation in various types of fuel tanks and systems.
Compatible with a wide range of vehicles and machinery, including cars, trucks, and industrial equipment.
Requires minimal maintenance due to its robust design and reliable performance.

Product Specification.description: The Laser Printer offers high-quality printing with fast speed and efficient performance. Ideal for office and professional use, it provides sharp text and clear graphics, making it suitable for a variety of printing needs.

SpecializationPoints.description: Delivers sharp and clear text and images with high resolution, ensuring professional-quality output.
Prints documents quickly, increasing productivity and reducing wait times for large print jobs.
Supports automatic double-sided printing to save paper and reduce printing costs.
Equipped with a large paper tray to handle high-volume printing without frequent paper refills.
Includes network connectivity options for easy sharing and access from multiple devices in a networked environment.
Designed to be energy-efficient, reducing power consumption and operating costs.
Features an intuitive control panel and easy-to-navigate settings for hassle-free operation.

Product Specification.description: The D-Link Wire Bundle is designed for reliable and efficient connection of CCTV and other surveillance equipment. It provides high-quality signal transmission and durability for extended use.

SpecializationPoints.description: Ensures clear and reliable video and data transmission for CCTV systems.
Constructed with robust materials for long-lasting performance and resistance to wear and tear.
Suitable for connecting a range of surveillance and networking devices.
Provides sufficient length for versatile installation options.

Product Specification.description: The Wireless Receiver Transmitter is used for transmitting and receiving wireless signals between devices. It supports various applications including audio and video transmission, offering flexibility and convenience.

SpecializationPoints.description: Provides reliable transmission and reception of wireless signals, eliminating the need for cables.
Supports a range of devices and applications for versatile usage.
Ensures stable and clear signal transfer with minimal interference.
Features a straightforward setup process for quick and easy installation.

Product Specification.description: The Parking Sensor helps in detecting obstacles while parking, providing audio or visual alerts to prevent collisions and enhance safety.

SpecializationPoints.description: Detects obstacles around the vehicle and alerts the driver to prevent collisions.
Provides clear alerts through sounds or visuals for easy recognition of obstacles.
Designed for simple installation on the vehicle’s rear or front bumper.
Allows adjustment of sensitivity levels to suit different parking environments.

Product Specification.description: MDVR Installation service involves setting up Mobile Digital Video Recorders (MDVRs) in vehicles. This includes hardware setup, configuration, and testing to ensure optimal performance.

SpecializationPoints.description: Expert installation of MDVR systems to ensure proper functioning and integration with vehicle systems.
Includes hardware installation, system configuration, and testing for reliability.
Provides ongoing support and troubleshooting to address any issues post-installation.
Tailored installation services to meet specific needs and requirements of different vehicles.

Product Specification.description: GPS Installation service involves the setup of GPS tracking systems in vehicles. This service includes hardware installation, system configuration, and calibration to ensure accurate location tracking.

SpecializationPoints.description: Professional installation of GPS tracking systems to ensure accurate and reliable operation.
Includes configuring the GPS system settings for optimal performance and accuracy.
Calibrates the GPS system to ensure precise location tracking and functionality.
Offers support and troubleshooting services to address any issues that arise after installation.
